intro.description: To produce target solutions, we must load some ownship data. We'll do that now.

item.title: Find SATC subfolder and Load Ownship Track
item.description:
In the Navigator view:
1. Open the SATC sub-folder and either drag the L1_OwnshipTrack.rep file into the Debrief plot area or right click and select Open With > Debrief Plot Editor.
2. Select Over the Ground mode. You will now see the blue ownship track in your window.

item.title: Load ownship sensor data
item.description:
Next, we will load the ownship sensor data (this is the sonar data):
1. Drag and drop the L1_OwnshipSensor.dsf file onto the plot, the Import Sensor Wizard will appear.
2. You can leave this sensor contact name as plain and click on Next
3. Choose a color for the sensor data, then click Next.
4. Select the value check box so that the sensor data will be visible, then click Next.
5. In the Rainbow shades dialog, select the check box to show the sensor cuts and click on Finish.
The dialog box will close and the fan of ownship bearing data (sonar data) will be seen radiating north-west and north from the ownship track. If you don't see this, repeat the above steps making sure you've loaded the correct files.
Now we've loaded our data, we can create a scenario.
